title: Metaverse: Embracing Virtual Reality from Global Tech Industry in 2022 - Analytics Insight
content: Metaverse: Embracing Virtual Reality from Global Tech Industry in 2022  Analytics Insight
description: There is a crack in the Metaverse platform from the embracing of virtual reality by the global tech industry. Zuckerberg Meta is not the only one aiming at Metaverse to drive profit from digital domains.
